scripts.build_bn128: node tools/buildwasm_bn128.js; browserify main_bn128.js -o build/wasmsnark_bn128.js --exclude worker_threads --exclude crypto; cp build/wasmsnark_bn128.js example/bn128/wasmsnark_bn128.js
scripts.build_mnt6753: node tools/buildwasm_mnt6753.js; browserify main_mnt6753.js -o build/wasmsnark_mnt6753.js --exclude worker_threads --exclude crypto; cp build/wasmsnark_mnt6753.js example/mnt6753/wasmsnark_mnt6753.js
